thread.title: Three Dense Forests To Visit In Amazing Rajasthan
thread.title_full: Three Dense Forests To Visit In Amazing Rajasthan

title: Three Dense Forests To Visit In Amazing Rajasthan
text:
Three Dense Forests To Visit In Amazing Rajasthan Three Dense Forests To Visit In Amazing Rajasthan 0 
It is the largest destination of nation and its geographical regions are covered with varieties of landscapes. Explore various dense sites of the state in your coming vacation in a most thrilling experience. 
Different types of dense regions are covered with various forests namely Dense Thorn Forest and Dry Deciduous Forest. Travel across these scenic sites and enjoy your thrilling holiday. Nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts can have some unforgettable time in the destinations. Explore wildness features of the locations during your Rajasthan tour. All the directions of state are covered with some dense forests. Forests are developed as protected habitats for various wild species. Some of the famous wildlife centres you can visit for your exceptional travel experience are: 
DESERT NATIONAL PARK - The national park is situated in the region of Jaisalmer. This is one of the most comfortable locations for enjoying wildlife tour. You can travel in and around 3,162 square kilometres large forest through Jeep Safari. The region is exceptional from other wildlife habitats because of its unique eco-system and varied fauna. Common species available here are Eagle, Vultures, Laggar Falcons, Buzzards, Harriers, Short-toed Eagle, Spotted Eagles, Falcons and Tawny Eagles. In the natural habitat, there are also Seashells and Massive Fossilised Trunk Trees that back to hundreds year. 
RANTHAMBORE NATIONAL PARK - The national park is the world famous destination to observe Tigers. The forest was declared in the year 1973 as Tiger Reserve. Everyday people from various countries and other domestic regions visited here to have some thrilling time. Large population of wild species make this national park a great place for wildlife and adventure lovers. It is located in Sawai Madhopur district which is among the frequently visited destinations in the state of Rajasthan. You must experience thrilling Jeep Safari in the wildlife habitat. 
DHOSI HILL - Regions of the Dhosi hill are amazing. Varieties of herbs plantations are available here. You can enjoy lovely evening in the location by walking along the narrow streets of herbs plantations. The site is located in Jhunjhun which is one of the least discover destinations of the state. Be the first one to visit here and discover the unique eco-system. Travel in and around the scenic location and feel the pleasant environment. 
These are the three suggested dense regions you can cover in your itinerary. Apart from this you can personalize your holiday itinerary at the time of selection of your package. You can also include other destinations in your holiday according to your needs and interest. Travel everywhere and enjoy happy holiday in Rajasthan.
